ideaBody: We should convert the codebase from JavaScript to TypeScript. Would help with maintainability.
projectContext: Node.js Express API with 150+ JS files, no type definitions

ideaBody: We deploy manually right now by SSHing into the server. Need proper CI/CD.
projectContext: Python Flask app deployed on a single EC2 instance

ideaBody: Our JS bundle is 2.5MB. First load takes forever. Need to get it down.
projectContext: React SPA with Webpack, lots of dependencies

ideaBody: Database queries are hitting the DB every time. Should add Redis or something for caching.
projectContext: Node.js API with PostgreSQL, high read traffic

ideaBody: We want to switch to Postgres for better JSON support and full-text search.
projectContext: Rails app with MySQL 5.7, ~50 tables

ideaBody: We need to version our API. Breaking changes are causing problems for mobile clients on older versions.
projectContext: Express.js REST API consumed by mobile and web clients

ideaBody: Works on my machine issues. Let's use Docker so everyone has the same environment.
projectContext: Python Django app with Celery workers and Redis

ideaBody: We use console.log everywhere. Need proper structured logging so we can debug production issues.
projectContext: Node.js microservices, currently using console.log

ideaBody: Some queries are doing full table scans. Need to add proper indexes.
projectContext: PostgreSQL database with 10M+ rows in key tables

ideaBody: We have 8 separate repos that share code. Should consolidate into a monorepo with Turborepo or Nx.
projectContext: Multiple TypeScript packages across separate GitHub repos

ideaBody: REST is getting messy with all the nested resources. GraphQL might be better for our frontend needs.
projectContext: Express REST API with React frontend doing lots of data joining client-side

ideaBody: Our test coverage is at 23%. Need to get it up. Critical paths have no tests at all.
projectContext: TypeScript Node.js app with Vitest, 23% coverage

ideaBody: Background jobs are running inline and blocking requests. Need async processing with a queue.
projectContext: Node.js API doing email sending and PDF generation synchronously

ideaBody: We don't know when errors happen in production until users complain. Need Sentry or something similar.
projectContext: React + Node.js full-stack app with no error monitoring

ideaBody: We need to be able to toggle features on/off without deploying. Would help with gradual rollouts.
projectContext: SaaS platform with weekly releases

ideaBody: npm audit shows 47 vulnerabilities. Many deps are 3+ major versions behind.
projectContext: Node.js app with package.json last updated 18 months ago

ideaBody: All our infra is set up manually in AWS console. Need to codify it with Terraform or CDK.
projectContext: AWS infrastructure managed through console clicks

ideaBody: Our API docs are always out of date. Need to generate them from code - maybe OpenAPI/Swagger.
projectContext: Express.js API with hand-written Markdown docs

ideaBody: We have unit tests but no E2E tests. Critical user flows break without us knowing.
projectContext: React app with Vitest unit tests, no E2E framework

ideaBody: We keep running out of database connections under load. Need connection pooling.
projectContext: Node.js app with raw pg driver, no pooling configured
